metadata.title: CVE-2020-21426 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function C_IStream::read in PluginEXR.cppin FreeImage 3.18.0 allows remote attackers to run arbitrary code and causeother impacts via crafted image file.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2025-01-16').
